question: Which of the following give information regarding to the ancestry of Muinuddin Chishti?
explanation: Information about Khwaja Muinuddin Chishti is available only in a Suhrawardi text, Siyar-al-Arijin which was compiled almost 300 years after his death. The text of Siyar-al-Arijin gives details with regard to the ancestry of Muinuddin Chishti.
